DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effectiveness addition use Kinesio Taping patient chronic nonspecific low back pain receive conventional physical therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Addition Kinesio Taping Method Conventional Physical Therapy Treatment Patients With Chronic Nonspecific Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: One hundred forty-eight patient randomize receive either conventional physical therapy , consist combination manual therapy technique , general exercise specific exercise spinal segmental stabilization ( Conventional Physical Therapy Group ) receive conventional physical therapy plus addition Kinesio Taping lumbar spine ( Conventional Physical Therapy plus Kinesio Taping ) , period 5 week ( 10 session treatment ) . Clinical outcome ( pain intensity , disability global perceived effect ) collect baseline 5 week , 3 6 month randomization . Data collect blind examiner unaware group allocation . All statistical analysis conduct follow principle intention treat analysis between-group difference perform use Mixed Linear Models .
DOC.criteria: Patients nonspecific low back pain longer 12 week Seeking care low back pain Contra indication physical exercise Serious spinal pathology ( e.g . tumor , fracture inflammatory disease ) Nerve root compromise Contra indication Kinesio Taping ( e.g . intolerance tape , band aid etc ) Pregnancy Severe cardiorespiratory condition
